metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4428 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in OpenStack Dashboard (Horizon) 8.0.1 and earlier and 9.0.0 through 9.0.1 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML by injecting an AngularJS template in a dashboard form.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4428` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

openstack-dashboard - 2:9.1.2-0ubuntu1
openstack-dashboard-ubuntu-theme - 2:9.1.2-0ubuntu1
python-django-horizon - 2:9.1.2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: horizon package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:9.1.2-0ubuntu1').
